DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the total score of an individual assessed with the Oral Health Impact Profile questionnaire.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Measures a person's perceptions of the social impact of oral disorders on their well-being; measures self-reported dysfunction, discomfort and disability attributed to oral conditions._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Measures a person's perceptions of the social impact of oral disorders on their well-being; measures self-reported dysfunction, discomfort and disability attributed to oral conditions.

Concepts.definition: Measures a person's perceptions of the social impact of oral disorders on their well-being; measures self-reported dysfunction, discomfort and disability attributed to oral conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CCR using best practices for curation of measures. mc 2/29/12
